00163         /*---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00164         /* The following functions must not be called by an application.       */
00165         /* They are the entry point from the stack callback functions into our */
00166         /* object orientated framework (APOXI).                                */
00167         /* They are implemented as static because they have to be passed as    */
00168         /* normal C function pointers. The reason for this is the BT-API Stack */
00169         /* interface that demands C function pointers for callback the         */
00170         /* callback functions it calls to state the progress of ongoing        */
00171         /* operations                                                          */
00172         /*---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
